ygData.messageBody:
Spoiler space before spoiler request...
*

I've been doing this rather long quest - I forgot where it started, but I
was given a letter of release for a prisoner, who, it turns out, had
already escaped. However, I was given part of the gem he had stolen, and
if I can get the whole thing reassembled, I believe the Dwarves of Kaladim
will be REALLY happy.
Well, I sucessfully tracked him down, and got the shard from him, but NOW
he says I need the second shard, which he hid in Kelethin - only some guild
here found it and is calling it the "Gem of Tunare" :P
So - where oh where is the Gem of Tunare? I've asked, and not one guild
answers :P

Thanks in advance...

Talies the lost Wanderer
